full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI YANG 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA RGYAL MO'I ZHABS 'BRING PA GUD TSE DBANG NOR BU SOGS DANG, MTSO LDAN DPON LAG RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
